name: Apesec Legends
description:
Do you think you can become the champion in this Apex Legends fangame? Well try to find out as you battle through fat Gibby's, annoying Bangalores, and probably your own teammates... Who knows you might even drop a 4k!

Main Menu Codes (Type these in the menu to activate):

IItzTimmy - Puts on the Timmy skin!

Aceu - Puts on my sweet sweet AceBoo skin <3

Speedrun - skips the tutorial if you wanna rush into the game! Try to beat my fastest time of 8:19!
